Acceptance Criteria: Profile picture and full name prominently displayed in header. Reliable image loading without errors. Name matches logged-in account exactly.
Screen Definition: Welcome page with doctor's basic information display
Specification: Doctor profile header with picture and name
User Story: As a doctor, I want my profile and name visible on the welcome page to confirm correct account access.

Acceptance Criteria: Display 3-5 recent comments by default. 'View All' button expands to complete feedback history. Reply button on each comment opens text input. Rating breakdown by categories. Load within 2 seconds.
Screen Definition: Recent patient comments with detailed view and reply options
User Story: As a doctor, I want to see and respond to patient feedback to manage my reputation and improve service.

Acceptance Criteria: Show appointment requests with patient name, date, time. Accept/Reject buttons process immediately. Auto-notify patients of doctor's decision. 'View All' shows complete history.
Screen Definition: Patient appointment requests with approval controls
User Story: As a doctor, I want to review and manage appointment requests to control my schedule effectively.

Acceptance Criteria: Welcome icon redirects to homepage. Quick-access buttons for account, reviews, blog management. All buttons respond within 1 second of click.
Screen Definition: Quick access icons for key doctor features
User Story: As a doctor, I want quick access to important features for efficient navigation between sections.

Acceptance Criteria: Profile editing with auto-save and confirmation. Account delete/deactivate requires password confirmation. Hospital listing request with pending status. Logout redirects to login screen.
Screen Definition: Doctor account options and profile management
User Story: As a doctor, I want to manage my account details and control my visibility and security settings.

Acceptance Criteria: All reviews load within 2 seconds. Filter by 1-5 star ratings and comment keywords. Display reviewer name, date, star rating, full comment. Filter results show under 0.5s delay.
Screen Definition: Patient reviews with filtering and display options
User Story: As a doctor, I want to view and filter patient reviews to track performance and satisfaction levels.

Acceptance Criteria: 'Add New' button opens blank editor. Tap-and-hold reveals Edit/Delete options. Auto-save drafts every 10 seconds. Published posts appear instantly in listing.
Screen Definition: Blog post creation and management interface
User Story: As a doctor, I want to create and manage blog posts to share medical knowledge with patients.

Acceptance Criteria: Display 50 recent visits by default. Show patient name, visit date/time, consultation reason. Real-time search by name/date under 500ms. Complete history loads within 3 seconds.
Screen Definition: Chronological patient visit history with search functionality
User Story: As a doctor, I want to view patient visit history to track consultations and enable follow-ups.
